description:
floating-ip-create shows that floating-ip-pool is optional, but it is need to specify pool name.

#################
# help menu
#################
[root@cnode35-m ~(keystone_admin)]# nova help floating-ip-create
usage: nova floating-ip-create [<floating-ip-pool>]

Allocate a floating IP for the current tenant.

Positional arguments:
  <floating-ip-pool>  Name of Floating IP Pool. (Optional)

#################
# error log
#################
[root@cnode35-m ~(keystone_admin)]# nova floating-ip-create
ERROR: FloatingIpPoolNotFound: Floating ip pool not found. (HTTP 404) (Request-ID: req-224995d7-b1bf-4b82-83f6-d9259c1ca265)
title: nova floating-ip-create needs pool name

comments.content:
floating-ip-create shows that floating-ip-pool is optional, but it is need to specify pool name.

#################
# help menu
#################
[root@cnode35-m ~(keystone_admin)]# nova help floating-ip-create
usage: nova floating-ip-create [<floating-ip-pool>]

Allocate a floating IP for the current tenant.

Positional arguments:
  <floating-ip-pool>  Name of Floating IP Pool. (Optional)

#################
# error log
#################
[root@cnode35-m ~(keystone_admin)]# nova floating-ip-create
ERROR: FloatingIpPoolNotFound: Floating ip pool not found. (HTTP 404) (Request-ID: req-224995d7-b1bf-4b82-83f6-d9259c1ca265)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~choonho-son

comments.content:
I have tried this command using the latest nova code in the master branch.  It works fine for me: 

$ nova floating-ip-create
+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| Ip         | Server Id | Fixed Ip | Pool   |
+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| 172.24.4.3 | -         | -        | public |
+------------+-----------+----------+--------+

What nova version are you using?  Which networking are you using: nova-network, neutron (open vswitch), etc?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham

comments.content:
My openstack is RedHat OpenStack.

[root@cnode36-m dev(keystone_admin)]# rpm -qa |grep nova
openstack-nova-novncproxy-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-console-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
python-nova-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-cert-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-common-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
python-novaclient-2.17.0-2.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-compute-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-api-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-scheduler-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
openstack-nova-conductor-2014.1.1-3.el6.noarch
